input_text:
Job Title: Sr. Project Manager - Electrical Construction

Location: High Point, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Job Title: Senior Project Manager

Location: Greensboro/Winston-Salem/High Point

Salary: $90-130k/year + BONUS + COMPANY TRUCK/GAS CARD + GREAT BENEFITS!

Requirements: Electrical Project Management of $15M+ complex projects

For almost 70 years, we've been a best-in-class Electrical Contractor providing industrial and municipal industries with Electrical Design/Build, Instrumentation & Controls, and Calibration Services. We primarily serve the bio-pharmaceutical, chemical, water/wastewater, power generation, and industrial manufacturing industries.

We're a "Best Places to Work" establishment with over 400 employees across North Carolina. Due to rapid growth and demand for our services, we're looking for a Senior Project Manager to manage large, complex electrical projects in the $15M-35M+ range.

Requirements

5+ years Project Management experience managing complex projects $15M+Experience managing industrial and/or municipal projects (pharmaceutical, chemical, water and wastewater, power generation, manufacturing, food/beverage, gas, etc.)Construction software experience is a plus (we use Microsoft Project)

Benefits

Company Vehicle & Gas CardMedical, Dental, & Vision Insurance401k MatchPTO and Paid HolidaysCompany Cell Phone & Laptop

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Abi.Harper@CyberCoders.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : AH12-1796211L212 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Abi Harper - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
